law.catch_line: Person acquiring leave for mill or factory not to disturb existing rights.
law.text: No person shall, by reason of leave to build a mill or factory, draw the water from the millpond of another existing at the time of the condemnation, or do anything injurious to a vested interest in any waterworks then existing on the watercourse.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2716.
